name: ffscrap
author: Ivan Zderadicka
description: Get easily tabular data (in csv format) from any page using very simple script to define what data to scrap from a page

preferences.name: scraperSource
preferences.title: URL of remote source of scrapers
preferences.description: Scraping scripts will be loaded from this url, beware a) you have to trust this source, b) it will overwrite your scripts with same name
